verses.verse: Then they told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8737><s%> against Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, and they rob <S%H8154><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the threshingfloors <S%H1637><s%>.

Therefore David <S%H1732><s%> enquired <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Shall I go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> these Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Keilah <S%H7084><s%>.

And David's <S%H1732><s%> men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Behold, we be afraid <S%H3373><s%> here in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>: how much more then if we come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> against the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> ?

Then David <S%H1732><s%> enquired <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>; for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and brought away <S%H5090><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>. So David <S%H1732><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Evyatar <S%H54><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, that he came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with an ephod <S%H646><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8714><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him into mine hand <S%H3027><s%>; for he is shut in <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, by entering <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into a town <S%H5892><s%> that hath gates <S%H1817><s%> and bars <S%H1280><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> called <S%H8085><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%>, to go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, to besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8800><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> secretly practised <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8688><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> against him; and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Evyatar <S%H54><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, Bring hither <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath certainly <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> for my sake.

Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver me up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>? will Saul <S%H7586><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, as thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? O YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, I beseech thee, tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, He will come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me and my men <S%H582><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They will deliver thee up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%>, which were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H376><s%>, arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and departed <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, and went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> whithersoever <S%H834><s%> they could go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%>. And it was told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8717><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was escaped <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from Keilah <S%H7084><s%>; and he forbare <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in strong holds <S%H4679><s%>, and remained <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a mountain <S%H2022><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him every day <S%H3117><s%>, but 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him not into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%> in a wood <S%H2793><s%>.

And Y'honatan <S%H3083><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> into the wood <S%H2793><s%>, and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> in 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: for the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> shall not find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee; and thou shalt be king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and I shall be next <S%H4932><s%> unto thee; and that also Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And they two <S%H8147><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the wood <S%H2793><s%>, and Y'honatan <S%H3083><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>.

Then came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Ziphites <S%H2130><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Doth not David <S%H1732><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8693><s%> himself with us in strong holds <S%H4679><s%> in the wood <S%H2793><s%>, in the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Hachilah <S%H2444><s%>, which is on the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon <S%H3452><s%> ?

Now therefore, O king <S%H4428><s%>, come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%> according to all the desire <S%H185><s%> of thy soul <S%H5315><s%> to come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and our part shall be to deliver <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him into the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be ye of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for ye have compassion <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on me.

Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> yet, and know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%> where his haunt <S%H7272><s%> is, and who hath seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him there: for it is told <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me that he dealeth very <S%H6191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> subtilly <S%H6191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therefore, and take knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of all the lurking places <S%H4224><s%> where he hideth <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself, and come ye again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to me with the certainty <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and I will go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be <S%H3426><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, that I will search <S%H2664><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him out throughout all the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And they arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Ziph <S%H2128><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>: but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon <S%H4584><s%>, in the plain <S%H6160><s%> on the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon <S%H3452><s%>.

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> him. And they told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>: wherefore he came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into a rock <S%H5553><s%>, and abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon <S%H4584><s%>. And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that, he pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon <S%H4584><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on this side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> on that side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> made haste <S%H2648><s%> <S%H8737><s%> to get away <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for fear <S%H6440><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>; for Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> compassed <S%H5849><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> round about <S%H5849><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.

But there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Haste <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thee, and come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have invaded <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

Wherefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from pursuing <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: therefore they called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Selahammahlekoth <S%H5555><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thence, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in strong holds <S%H4679><s%> at Engedi <S%H5872><s%>.
